name: DeadpanGulch
description:
Welcome to Deadpan Gulch

Fight to get the most gold-rich land before your opponents!

Win by having the most gold when all land is taken or by killing all of your opponents.

Click on the grid to claim land, can only claim adjacent tiles. Trying to claim land that already belongs to someone initiates a quick-draw duel.

If you're quick on the draw your opponent is out of the game, if not then you are.

Font used from https://www.1001fonts.com/vanilla-whale-font.html
